Modal tabs
Lorem ipsum

Modal tabs

Modals can be used to streamline updates. This template uses a variation of tabs to organize information and horizontal sliding for swift animation between panes.

Edit profile
Copy 
<a href='#fakelink' class='btn btn-primary' data-toggle='modal' data-target='#modal'>Edit profile</a>

<div id='modal' class='animate modal'>
  <div class='modal-dialog'>
    <form method='post' class='container-fluid'>
      <div class='col-sm-6 col-xs-12 fill-white modal-content contain'>
        <div class='pad2y pad4x keyline-bottom space-bottom clearfix'>
          <div class='col-sm-3'>
            <h4>Profile</h4>
          </div>
          <div class='col-sm-9 text-right tabs'>
            <a href='#account' class='small pad0 active' data-toggle='tab'>
              Account
            </a>
            <a href='#bio' class='small pad0' data-toggle='tab'>
              Bio
            </a>
            <a href='#location' class='small pad0' data-toggle='tab'>
              Location
            </a>
            <a href='#notifications' class='small pad0' data-toggle='tab'>
              Notifications
            </a>
          </div>
        </div>
        
        <div class='space-bottom2 row10 tab-content sliding h'>
          
          <div class='tab-pane active animate pad4x' id='account'>
            <fieldset>
              <div class='media'>
                <a class='media-left pad1r' href='#fakelink'>
                  <img src='/img/regularshow.jpg' class='img-rounded' width='70'>
                </a>
                <div class='media-body pad1l'>
                  <a href='#fakelink' class='btn btn-default'>Upload new picture</a>
                  <p class='small quiet pad0y'>
                    You can also drag and drop a picture from your computer.
                  </p>
                </div>
              </div>
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='name'>Name</label>
              <input id='name' type='text' class='stretch' value='Rigby'>
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='email'>Email</label>
              <input id='email' type='text' class='stretch' value='rigby@gmail.com'>
            </fieldset>
          </div>
          
          <div class='tab-pane animate pad4x' id='bio'>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='website'>Website</label>
              <input id='website' type='text' class='stretch' value='rigby.com'>
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='rigbybio'>Bio</label>
              <textarea id='rigbybio' class='stretch' rows='9'>Rigby is the second of the two lead protagonists of Regular Show, along with his best friend Mordecai.
              </textarea>
            </fieldset>
          </div>

          <div class='tab-pane animate pad4x' id='location'>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='business'>Business name</label>
              <input id='business' type='text' class='stretch' value='Cartoon Network'>
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='street'>Address</label>
              <input id='street' type='text' class='stretch'>
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='csz'>City, State, Zip</label>
              <input id='csz' type='text' class='stretch'>
            </fieldset>
          </div>            

          <div class='tab-pane animate pad4x' id='notifications'>
            <p>Email me when</p>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='following'>Someone starts following me</label>
              <div class='rounded-toggle inline'>
                <input id='following-off' type='radio' name='following' value='off'>
                <label for='following-off'>Off</label>
                <input id='following-on' type='radio' name='following' value='on' checked='checked'>
                <label for='following-on'>On</label>
              </div>                  
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
              <label for='comment'>Someone likes my comment</label>
              <div class='rounded-toggle inline'>
                <input id='comment-off' type='radio' name='comment' value='off'>
                <label for='comment-off'>Off</label>
                <input id='comment-on' type='radio' name='comment' value='on' checked='checked'>
                <label for='comment-on'>On</label>
              </div>                  
            </fieldset>              
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class='modal-actions fill-gray pad2y pad4x text-right'>
          <a href='#fakelink' class='btn btn-default' data-dismiss='modal'>
            <i class='icon icon-remove pad0r'></i>Cancel
          </a>
          <a href='#fakelink' class='btn btn-primary' data-dismiss='modal'>
            <i class='icon icon-floppy-disk pad0r'></i>Save
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>      
    </form>
  </div>
</div>

// responsive styles
@media (max-width:767px) { 
  .text-right.tabs { 
    text-align: left; 
    padding-top: 10px; 
  }

  .text-right.tabs a:first-child { padding-left: 0; }

  .modal .pad4x { padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 20px; }
}
